original_title: A Film by Charles Baudelaire (Political Map of the World)
overview: The film purports to be the second version of a (fictional) film made by Baudelaire in 1850 in memory of his (actual) voyage across the Pacific. It was shot using a world map mounted on black board, filmed in its entirety and in extreme close-up.
title: A Film by Charles Baudelaire (Political Map of the World)
